attributes.action: Bring the death sentence back for convicted terrorist or guilty murderers
attributes.additional_details: Justice for those taken too soon
attributes.background: Sentence the guilty to death ,  the penalty should be , as they have put on to others ,  as they have done onto the victim or victims they should receive justification by removing them from tax payers money and fame or becoming notorious

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686
